entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of hail. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:37 PM PDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of hail. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 12:37 PM PDT Monday 3 April 2023
